abstract: Produced by the Australian Commonwealth Film Unit for the Department of Territories in 1957, this film illustrates - through mission work, education and cooperation between Papua and New Guinea - how people are bridging their differences.
description: A general picture of Papua New Guinea illustrating the development at that time being carried out by the Department of Territories.
